name: Rajeev Ranjan
title: Seasoned Front-End Developer with UI Architecture Expertise
summary: An accomplished Principal Product Developer with 18 years of experience specializing in frontend development and architecture. I've led the design and implementation of robust and scalable user interfaces, consistently delivering high-quality, impactful digital products. My expertise spans the entire development lifecycle, from initial concept to deployment and maintenance.
about: Seasoned Front-End Developer with UI Architecture Expertise having 18 years of experience specializing in frontend development and software architecture. Proven expertise in designing and delivering scalable, high-performance user interfaces that blend technical excellence with customer-centric design.

Throughout my career, I've led complex projects from concept to deployment, driving architecture decisions, performance optimization, and adoption of modern frameworks. My strength lies in translating business needs into robust frontend solutions, mentoring development teams, and setting technical direction to ensure sustainable, future-ready platforms.

Passionate about UI/UX excellence, clean architecture, and emerging web technologies, I thrive at the intersection of product innovation and technical leadership. I take pride in shaping engineering practices, fostering collaboration, and delivering impactful digital experiences that align with strategic business goals.

Establish and enforce front-end best practices, including coding standards, accessibility compliance, and performance optimization. Actively contribute to Agile/Scrum processes by facilitating sprint planning, standups, and retrospectives to ensure timely and efficient delivery.

Developed web applications such as AIOps and Cloud Cost Optimization using Angular. Collaborated closely with product managers, UX designers, and backend engineers to ensure UI development aligned with business goals. Actively engaged with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide regular updates.
